parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Size of the virtual sharp witness line data array (see Remarks )

title: IView.GetWitnessEntitiesCount
description: Gets the number of virtual sharp witness lines in this drawing view.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Size of the virtual sharp witness line data array (see Remarks )

returns: Number of virtual sharp witness lines in this drawing view
remarks:
Call this method to get the sizes of the arrays returned by
IView::GetWitnessGeomInfo
and
IView::IGetWitnessGeomInfo
.
